name: Little Server That Can
short_description:
LSTC is designed for the use of a server for Scratch (http://scratch.mit.edu/). It's also designed in a way that you can connect to different "plugins" allowing one person to play chat and another to play a multiplayer game without either of the projects interfering with the other.

With a little modification (of the parsing and sending messages), you can use it with raw sockets for other projects made outside of Scratch.
summary: LSTC is a plugin server in Python.
